description: The Accessorise (TM) Executive USB Stylus Pen is the Latest and Newest Design in the market which is provided three most popular items in one - Capacitive Stylus, 8GB 2.0 USB Flash Drive and Ballpoint Executive Pen. The Accessorise(TM) Executive USB Stylus Pen brings cutting edge technology and sophistication together to simplify your life.Accessorise(TM) Executive USB Stylus Pen is a great gift for everyone on all the occasions and yourself. It is a convenient tool for daily life.< /> Stylus tip for most touch screen tablets. USB Flash Drive for transfer files between computers, Mac and PC. Ballpoint Pen for writing note whenever you need.Designed to work on all Capacitive Touch Screen Devices, Phones and Tablets - Amazon Kindle Fire, iPad, iPad 2nd Generation, The New iPad 3rd Generation, iPhone 4S, iPod Touch, Motorola Xoom, Samsung Galaxy Tab, BlackBerry Playbook, Motorola Droid Xyboard, Motorola Xoom Family Edition, Samsung Galaxy Note, Asus Transformer Prime TF101 TF201, HP TouchPad, Lenovo Ideapad, Google Android Tablets and every capacitive touch panel device.
title: AYL (Black) 3-in-1 Executive Ballpoint Pen, Fibermesh Capacitive Stylus and 8GB 2.0 USB Flash Drive with 2 Extra Ink Refills and 1 Extra Stylus Tip
